letters.description: Conduct a comprehensive review of the client's medical history, lifestyle, diet, and current symptoms.
Evaluate the body’s tissue states and constitution using traditional energetic principles like hot, cold, damp, or dry.
Match specific botanical properties from the materia medica to the client's unique physiological and energetic needs.
Ensure herbal protocols support systemic function and safely complement any existing medical treatments or pharmaceuticals.
Create custom herbal preparations and provide a clear, actionable administration schedule for the client.
Monitor clinical progress over time and adjust the protocol to support sustained health and long-term vitality.
